blocks.name: axsep
blocks.content: Separation Scheme, which is an axiom scheme of Zermelo's original theory. Scheme Sep of [BellMachover] p. 463. As we show here, it is redundant if we assume Replacement in the form of ~ ax-rep . Some textbooks present Separation as a separate axiom scheme in order to show that much of set theory can be derived without the stronger Replacement. The Separation Scheme is a weak form of Frege's Axiom of Comprehension, conditioning it (with ` x e. z ` ) so that it asserts the existence of a collection only if it is smaller than some other collection ` z ` that already exists. This prevents Russell's paradox ~ ru . In some texts, this scheme is called "Aussonderung" or the Subset Axiom. The variable ` x ` can appear free in the wff ` ph ` , which in textbooks is often written ` ph ( x ) ` . To specify this in the Metamath language, we _omit_ the distinct variable requirement ($d) that ` x ` not appear in ` ph ` . For a version using a class variable, see ~ zfauscl , which requires the Axiom of Extensionality as well as Separation for its derivation. If we omit the requirement that ` y ` not occur in ` ph ` , we can derive a contradiction, as ~ notzfaus shows (showing the necessity of that condition in ~ zfauscl ). However, as ~ axsep2 shows, we can eliminate the restriction that ` z ` not occur in ` ph ` . Note: the distinct variable restriction that ` z ` not occur in ` ph ` is actually redundant in this particular proof, but we keep it since its purpose is to demonstrate the derivation of the exact ~ ax-sep from ~ ax-rep . This theorem should not be referenced by any proof. Instead, use ~ ax-sep below so that the uses of the Axiom of Separation can be more easily identified. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm axsep(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))), diffsw(s2, w0))
  mpbi(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)))))))
  mpg(hs0, wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)))))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))))
  axrep5(hs0, s2, s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))
  nfv(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))
  spimev(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  a1d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  alrimiv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wi(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  adantrd(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  syl6(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  equtr(s0, hs0, s1)
  equcomi(s0, s1)
  exbii(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
  albii(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))
  bibi2i(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))
  bitr3i(wex(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0))))
  exbii(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)))
  an12(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0)
  equsexvw(hs0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axsep(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))), d(s2, w0))
  mpbi(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0)))))))
  mpg(hs0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0)))))), (hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚Üí ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0)‚Üí s1 = s0)))))
  axrep5(hs0, s2, s0, s1, (hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0))
  nfv(s0, (hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0))
  spimev(s0, hs0, hs0 ‚àà s2, ‚àÄ(s1,((hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0)‚Üí s1 = s0)))
  a1d(s0 = hs0, hs0 ‚àà s2, ‚àÄ(s1,((hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0)‚Üí s1 = s0)))
  alrimiv(s1, s0 = hs0, ((hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0)‚Üí s1 = s0))
  adantrd(s0 = hs0, hs0 = s1, w0, s1 = s0)
  syl6(s0 = hs0, hs0 = s1, s1 = s0, s0 = s1)
  equtr(s0, hs0, s1)
  equcomi(s0, s1)
  exbii(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0))))), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))))
  albii(s1, (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0)))), (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))
  bibi2i(s1 ‚àà s0, ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0))), (s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))
  bitr3i(‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0))), (s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0), ‚àÉ(hs0,(hs0 = s1 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))))
  exbii(hs0, (hs0 = s1 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)), (hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(hs0 = s1 ‚àß w0)))
  an12(hs0 = s1, hs0 ‚àà s2, w0)
  equsexvw(hs0, s1, (hs0 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0), (s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ‚àà s2, w0, s1 ‚àà s2)
  elequ1(hs0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = s1, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))
}

blocks.name: ax-sep
blocks.content: The Axiom of Separation of ZF set theory. See ~ axsep for more information. It was derived as ~ axsep above and is therefore redundant, but we state it as a separate axiom here so that its uses can be identified more easily. (Contributed by NM, 11-Sep-2006.)
blocks.origin:
axiom ax-sep(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom ax-sep(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
}

blocks.name: axsep2
blocks.content: A less restrictive version of the Separation Scheme ~ axsep , where variables ` x ` and ` z ` can both appear free in the wff ` ph ` , which can therefore be thought of as ` ph ( x , z ) ` . This version was derived from the more restrictive ~ ax-sep with no additional set theory axioms. (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm axsep2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  chvarv(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))))
  albidv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  elequ2(hs0, s2, s1)
  anabs5(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), w0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axsep2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  chvarv(hs0, s2, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))))))
  exbidv(s0, hs0 = s2, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))))
  albidv(s1, hs0 = s2, (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))), (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))
  bibi2d(hs0 = s2, s1 ‚àà s0, (s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)), (s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))
  syl6bb(hs0 = s2, (s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)), (s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0), (s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))
  anbi1d(hs0 = s2, s1 ‚àà hs0, (s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0), s1 ‚àà s2)
  elequ2(hs0, s2, s1)
  anabs5(s1 ‚àà s2, w0)
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, (s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, s1 ‚àà s2, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ‚àà s2 ‚àß w0))
}

blocks.name: zfauscl
blocks.content: Separation Scheme (Aussonderung) using a class variable. To derive this from ~ ax-sep , we invoke the Axiom of Extensionality (indirectly via ~ vtocl ), which is needed for the justification of class variable notation. If we omit the requirement that ` y ` not occur in ` ph ` , we can derive a contradiction, as ~ notzfaus shows. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)
blocks.origin:
thm zfauscl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  vtocl(hs0, c0, wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)))))
  exbidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))))
  albidv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s1), c0))
  eleq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s1))
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm zfauscl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))))
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  vtocl(hs0, c0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)))))
  exbidv(s0, hs0 = c0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0))), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))))
  albidv(s1, hs0 = c0, (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)), (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))
  bibi2d(hs0 = c0, s1 ‚àà s0, (s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))
  anbi1d(hs0 = c0, s1 ‚àà hs0, w0, s1 ‚àà c0)
  eleq2(hs0, c0, s1)
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: bm1.3ii
blocks.content: Convert implication to equivalence using the Separation Scheme (Aussonderung) ~ ax-sep . Similar to Theorem 1.3(ii) of [BellMachover] p. 463. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)
blocks.origin:
thm bm1.3ii(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))
  -| wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  exlimiiv(hs0, wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0))), wa(wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0))))))
  sylbir(wa(wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0))))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0))), wex(s0, wa(wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0))))))
  19.42v(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0))))
  eximi(s0, wa(wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)))), wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0)))
  alanimi(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)), wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0))
  bimsc1(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  exan(hs0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), w0)))))
  mpbi(wex(hs0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))), wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  cbvexvw(s0, hs0, wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))))
  albidv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  elequ2(s0, hs0, s1)
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wal(s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), w0))))
  diff.wal.s(s0, s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s1, wi(w0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm bm1.3ii(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî w0)))
  ‚ä£ ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà s0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  exlimiiv(hs0, ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî w0))), (‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0))))))
  sylbir((‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0))‚àß ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0))))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî w0))), ‚àÉ(s0,(‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0))))))
  19.42v(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0)), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0))))
  eximi(s0, (‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0))‚àß ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)))), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî w0)))
  alanimi(s1, (w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0), (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)), (s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî w0))
  bimsc1(w0, s1 ‚àà hs0, s1 ‚àà s0)
  exan(hs0, ‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0)), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(s1 ‚àà hs0 ‚àß w0)))))
  mpbi(‚àÉ(hs0, ‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0))), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà s0))))
  cbvexvw(s0, hs0, ‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà s0)), ‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0)))
  albidv(s1, s0 = hs0, (w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà s0), (w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0))
  imbi2d(s0 = hs0, w0, s1 ‚àà s0, s1 ‚àà hs0)
  elequ2(s0, hs0, s1)
  ax-sep(s0, s1, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî w0))))
  diff.wal.s(s0, s1, (w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà hs0))
  diff.wi.s(s0, w0, s1 ‚àà hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s1,(w0 ‚Üí s1 ‚àà s0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: ax6vsep
blocks.content: Derive ~ ax6v (a weakened version of ~ ax-6 where ` x ` and ` y ` must be distinct), from Separation ~ ax-sep and Extensionality ~ ax-ext . See ~ ax6 for the derivation of ~ ax-6 from ~ ax6v . (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2013.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm ax6vsep(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wn(wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbi(wn(wal(s0, wn(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  ax-mp(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))))))
  ax-sep(s0, hs0, s1, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))
  eximi(s0, wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  syl(wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  alimi(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  biimpri(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  bibi2i(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))))
  biantru(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0))))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  ax-ext(hs0, s0, s1)
  df-ex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wi.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ax6vsep(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ‚ä¢ ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0, ¬¨ s0 = s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  mpbi(¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0, ¬¨ s0 = s1), ‚àÉ(s0, s0 = s1))
  ax-mp(‚àÉ(s0, s0 = s1), ‚àÉ(s0, ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚àß(hs0 = hs0 ‚Üí hs0 = hs0))))))
  ax-sep(s0, hs0, s1, (hs0 = hs0 ‚Üí hs0 = hs0))
  eximi(s0, ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚àß(hs0 = hs0 ‚Üí hs0 = hs0)))), s0 = s1)
  syl(‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚àß(hs0 = hs0 ‚Üí hs0 = hs0)))), s0 = s1, ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî hs0 ‚àà s1)))
  alimi(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚àß(hs0 = hs0 ‚Üí hs0 = hs0))), (hs0 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî hs0 ‚àà s1))
  biimpri((hs0 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî(hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚àß(hs0 = hs0 ‚Üí hs0 = hs0))), (hs0 ‚àà s0 ‚Üî hs0 ‚àà s1))
  bibi2i(hs0 ‚àà s0, hs0 ‚àà s1, (hs0 ‚àà s1 ‚àß(hs0 = hs0 ‚Üí hs0 = hs0)))
  biantru(hs0 ‚àà s1, (hs0 = hs0 ‚Üí hs0 = hs0))
  id(hs0 = hs0)
  ax-ext(hs0, s0, s1)
  df-ex(s0, s0 = s1)
  diff.wi.s(s0, hs0 = hs0, hs0 = hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wi.s(s1, hs0 = hs0, hs0 = hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
